required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of CTA30X Cell Injection in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory CD19-positive B-line Hematological Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: A Study of CTA30X Cell Injection in the Treatment of Relapsed or Refractory CD19-positive B-line Hematological Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: A study of CTA30X cell injection in the treatment of relapsed or refractory CD19-positive B-line hematological malignancies

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single arm, open-label, single-center study. This study is indicated for relapsed or refractory CD19+ B-line hematological malignancy: B-ALL and B-NHL. the selection of dose levels and the number of subjects are based on clinical tiral of similar foreign products. 3 groups of patients will be enrolled, 36 in each group. Primary objective is to explore the safety, main consideration is dose-related safety.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 28 days after CTA30X infusion
primary_outcome.description: Adverse events assessed according to NCI-CTCAE v5.0 criteria

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CTA30X infusion
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of treatment-emergent adverse events [Safety and Tolerability]

secondary_outcome.measure: B-cell acute lymphocytic leukemia (B-ALL), Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR + CRi ) at Month 1 and 3

secondary_outcome.measure: B-ALL, MRD negative overall response rate (MRD- ORR)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of MRD negative overall response rate (MRD- ORR) at 3 months after CTA30X infusion
Assessment of ORR at Month 6, 12, 18 and 24
From the first infusion of CTA30X to the occurrence of any event, including death, relapse or gene relapse, disease progression (any one occurs first), and the last visit

secondary_outcome.measure: B cell non-hodgkin's lymphoma (B-NHL), Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR + PR ) per Lugano 2014 criteria

arm_group.description: Dose escalation follows the standard 3+3 dose escalation design. A total of 3 dose levels are set for subjects.

intervention.description: CTA30X cell injection by intravenous infusion

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital，College of Medicine, Zhejiang University
